review: He has been our go-to doctor for the last 10 years for both my kids. He is a really amazing doctor - believes in minimum medicines and common sense. He is also very friendly and puts everyone at ease. Usually kids dont like o visit doctors but mine look forward to seeing him. Even the vaccination, he gives very gently and makes it as easy for them as possible.

We visited cloudnine Electronic City and met with the doctor Sanjeev for our little daughter. But it was not a good meeting. ** ***** **** *********. While diagnosing he was talking very rudely to us. Infact it is not only with us, with sister/nurses also he was very rude.
